roleset.name: to write again, revise

example.name: transitive
example.text: As it went to the conference panel now deliberating , the appropriations bill for the executive office of the president for fiscal 1990 contained some breathtaking attempts by Congress to rewrite the Constitution under the pretext of protecting the public 's money .

propbank.arg: under the pretext of protecting the public 's money

example.name: passive
example.text: What 's more , both administration and congressional officials hint that the notification requirement is likely to be dropped from the guidelines on coup attempts that are being rewritten by the panel and the White House .

propbank.arg: by the panel and the White House

roleset.note: REWRITE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rewrite' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'write'. (from rewrite.01-v predicate notes)
